alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Macon; Marion; Peach; Schley; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 1:50AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Macon, east central Marion, central Peach, southeastern Crawford, northern Schley and southern Taylor Counties through 215 AM EST... At 150 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Butler to near Doyle, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fort Valley, Buena Vista, Butler, Marshallville, Reynolds, Ideal, Murrays Crossroads, Whitewater State Park, Nakomis, Rupert, Charing, Garden Valley, Hicks, Potterville, Tazewell, Doyle, Lee Pope and Bartlett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Macon; Marion; Peach; Schley; Taylor
